T01nagast_u:1: taṃ namāmy asamajñānam acintyam anidarśanam || NagAst_01
T01nagast_u:3: viditaṃ deśitaṃ tadvad dhīmadbhyaḥ karuṇāvaśāt || NagAst_02
T01nagast_u:5: svabhāvena na taj jātam iti śūnyaṃ prakāśitam || NagAst_03
T01nagast_u:9: yady ajātāḥ saha svapnair na syāt taddarśanādikam || NagAst_05
T01nagast_u:11: tadvat pratyayajaṃ viśvaṃ tvayoktaṃ nātha sāṃvṛtam || NagAst_06
T01nagast_u:12: asty etat kṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiṃcid bālalāpanam |
T01nagast_u:14: kṛtakaṃ vastu no jātaṃ tadā kiṃ vārtamānikam |
T01nagast_u:15: kasya nāśād atītaṃ syād utpitsuḥ kim apekṣate || NagAst_08
T01nagast_u:16: svasmān na jāyate bhāvaḥ parasmān nobhayād api |
T01nagast_u:17: na san nāsan na sadasan kutaḥ kasyodayas tadā || NagAst_09
T01nagast_u:18: ajāte na svabhāvo 'sti kutaḥ svasmāt samudbhavaḥ |
T01nagast_u:20: svatve sati paratvaṃ syāt paratve svatvam iṣyate |
T01nagast_u:21: āpekṣikī tayoḥ siddhiḥ pārāvāram ivoditā || NagAst_11
T01nagast_u:22: yadā nāpekṣate kiṃ cit kutaḥ kiṃ cit tadā bhavet |
T01nagast_u:23: yadā nāpekṣate dīrghaṃ kuto hrasvādikaṃ tadā || NagAst_12
T01nagast_u:24: astitve sati nāstitvaṃ dīrghe hrasvaṃ tathā sati |
T01nagast_u:25: nāstitve sati cāstitvaṃ yat tasmād ubhayaṃ na sat || NagAst_13
T01nagast_u:27: saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca samyaṅmithyā svataḥ kutaḥ || NagAst_14
T01nagast_u:28: svata eva hi yo nāsti bhāvaḥ sarvo 'sti kas tadā |
T01nagast_u:29: para ity ucyate yo 'yaṃ na vinā svasvabhāvataḥ || NagAst_15
T01nagast_u:30: na svabhāvo 'sti bhāvānāṃ parabhāvo 'sti no yadā |
T01nagast_u:32: ādāv eva samaṃ jātāḥ svabhāvena ca nirvṛtāḥ |
T01nagast_u:33: anutpannāś ca tattvena tasmād dharmās tvayoditāḥ || NagAst_17
T01nagast_u:36: indriyair upalabdhaṃ yat tat tattvena bhaved yadi |
T01nagast_u:37: jātās tattvavido bālās tattvajñānena kiṃ tadā || NagAst_19
T01nagast_u:41: lokas tena yathābhūtam iti matvā tvayoditam || NagAst_21
T01nagast_u:45: vijñānasyāpy avijñeyā vācāṃ kim uta gocarāḥ || NagAst_23
T01nagast_u:47: bhūtaṃ tadvastu no bhūtaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaṃ jagat tvayā || NagAst_24
T01nagast_u:48: utpannaś ca sthito naṣṭaḥ svapne yadvat sutas tathā |
T01nagast_u:49: na cotpannaḥ sthito naṣṭa ukto loko 'rthatas tvayā || NagAst_25
T01nagast_u:50: kāraṇāt saṃbhavo dṛṣṭo yathā svapne tathetaraḥ |
T01nagast_u:51: saṃbhavaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ vibhavo 'pi matas tathā || NagAst_26
T01nagast_u:53: saṃbhārapūraṇān muktiḥ svapnavad bhāṣitā tvayā || NagAst_27
T01nagast_u:54: jātaṃ tathaiva no jātam āgataṃ gatam ity api |
T01nagast_u:55: baddho muktas tathā jñānī dvayam icchen na tattvavit || NagAst_28
T01nagast_u:56: utpattir yasya naivāsti tasya kā nirvṛtir bhavet |
T01nagast_u:58: utpanno 'pi na cotpanno yadvan māyāgajo mataḥ |
T01nagast_u:59: utpannaṃ ca tathā viśvam anutpannaṃ ca tattvataḥ || NagAst_30
T01nagast_u:61: lokanāthair hi sattvānāṃ na kaś cin mocitaś ca taiḥ || NagAst_31
T01nagast_u:62: te ca sattvāś ca no jātā ye nirvānti na te sphuṭam |
T01nagast_u:63: na kaś cin mocitaḥ kaiś cid iti proktaṃ mahāmune || NagAst_32
T01nagast_u:65: vastuśūnyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tvayoktaṃ kārakas tathā || NagAst_33
T01nagast_u:67: atha vā tatkriyākartṛ kārakasya prasajyate || NagAst_34
T01nagast_u:68: nāmamātraṃ jagat sarvam ity uccair bhāṣitaṃ tvayā |
T01nagast_u:69: abhidhānāt pṛthagbhūtam abhidheyaṃ na vidyate || NagAst_35
T01nagast_u:71: kalpanāpy asatī proktā yayā śūnyaṃ vikalpyate || NagAst_36
T01nagast_u:73: na ca jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ na cāsti na ca nāsti yat || NagAst_37
T01nagast_u:74: yan na caikaṃ na cānekaṃ nobhayaṃ na ca nobhayam |
T01nagast_u:76: yan nodeti na ca vyeti nocchedi na ca śāśvatam |
T01nagast_u:78: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T01nagast_u:79: tathāvidhaś ca saddharmas tatsamaś ca tathāgataḥ || NagAst_40
T01nagast_u:80: tat tattvaṃ paramārtho 'pi tathatā dravyam iṣyate |
T01nagast_u:81: bhūtaṃ tad avisaṃvādi tadbodhād buddha ucyate || NagAst_41
T01nagast_u:83: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā || NagAst_42
T01nagast_u:84: bhāvebhyaḥ śūnyatā nānyā na ca bhāvo 'sti tāṃ vinā |
T01nagast_u:85: tasmāt pratītyajā bhāvās tvayā śūnyāḥ prakāśitāḥ || NagAst_43
T01nagast_u:87: paratantra iti proktaḥ paramārthas tv akṛtrimaḥ || NagAst_44
T01nagast_u:88: svabhāvaḥ prakṛtis tattvaṃ dravyaṃ vastu sad ity api |
T01nagast_u:89: nāsti vai kapito bhāvo paratantras tu vidyate || NagAst_45
T01nagast_u:91: nāstīti kṛtakocchedād ucchedaś ca prakāśitaḥ || NagAst_46
T01nagast_u:92: tattvajñānena nocchedo na ca śāśvatatā matā |
T01nagast_u:93: vastuśūnyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ marīcipratimaṃ matam || NagAst_47
T01nagast_u:94: mṛgatṛṣṇājalaṃ yadvan nocchedi na ca śāśvatam |
T01nagast_u:95: tadvat sarvaṃ jagat proktaṃ nocchedi na ca śāśvatam || NagAst_48
T01nagast_u:97: antavān nāntavāṃś cāpi lokas tasya prasajyate || NagAst_49
T01nagast_u:98: jñāne sati yathā jñeyaṃ jñeye jñānaṃ tathā sati |
T01nagast_u:99: yatrobhayam anutpannam iti buddhaṃ tadāsti kim || NagAst_50
T01nagast_u:105: abhīkṣṇam iṣṭas trailokye niṣkapāṭo nirargalaḥ || NagAst_53
T01nagast_u:111: nītārtham iti nirdiṣṭaṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyataiva hi || NagAst_56
T01nagast_u:113: neyārthā ca tvayā nātha bhāṣitā saṃvṛtiś ca sā || NagAst_57
T01nagast_u:117: yad avāptaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ tenāstu tvatsamaṃ jagat || NagAst_59
